message: Let's be reasonable, Bob.  This offer benefits us both.
I'm willing to be fair, Alice, but your last offer was too far off.  This is a good compromise.
Bob, time is literally money for you.  I'm offering you a deal while there's still a decent amount left for you to take.
Alice, this is getting ridiculous. Accept this generous offer, or there will be nothing left for either of us soon.
Bob, I'm trying to be fair, but this is my final offer. Take it before inflation eats away at your share even more.
